name: Guess_Who
text:
Guess Who
Guess Who was a band who performed at the abandoned Bijou Opera House in 1969.
Their concert caused an uproar, prompting the Twin Peaks, Washington Town Council to ban rock concerts unless the performers provided written assurances that they would behave.
Behind the scenes
The Guess Who is a Canadian rock band best known for their 1960s and 1970s hits, "No Time," "American Woman," "Laughing," "These Eyes," "Undun," and "Share the Land."
